column5: Looking for a Great Waterfront Vacation on Beautiful Lake LBJ? We have what you are looking for, 2 beach condos in a popular waterfront resort on Lake LBJ in Granite Shoals.  *Constant level lake *2 recently remodeled 1 bedroom/1 bath--sleeps 4 (King bed and double futon, + double p/o couch *Fully equipped kitchen *Private beach, 2 pools, sunset decks, fishing, PWC day ramps, sand volleyball, shuffle board, and much more *Winter Texans Welcome! * Visi for reviews
